response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer allows for a fair exchange that reflects the product's true value while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further.", "product_price": 950000}
